updates.description: Updated the guide with Claude Code v2.1.20 release (January 27, 2026). Added v2.1.20 changelog with 14 entries including arrow key vim navigation, external editor shortcut in help menu, PR review status indicator, CLAUDE.md loading from --add-dir directories, task deletion, dynamic task lists, /copy command general availability, and config backup rotation plus bug fixes. Added two new hook events (PostToolUseFailure and SubagentStart) from official documentation. Added /copy slash command to the commands list. Added CLAUDE_CODE_ADDITIONAL_DIRECTORIES_CLAUDE_MD environment variable. Created new comprehensive Desktop App Features section documenting diff view with inline commenting, git worktrees for parallel sessions, .worktreeinclude file for copying gitignored files, and installation links for macOS/Windows. Updated guide changelog to version 2026.1.6 and update-log.md with the changes.
updates.sections: [Changelog, Hook Events, Slash Commands, Environment Variables, Desktop App Features (NEW), VSCode Plugin Features, This Guide's Changelog]

updates.description: Updated the guide with Claude Code v2.1.19 release information including the new CLAUDE_CODE_ENABLE_TASKS environment variable, shorthand argument syntax ($0, $1) for custom commands, bracket syntax change for indexed arguments ($ARGUMENTS[0]), new CLI flags (--json-schema, --permission-prompt-tool, --setting-sources, --allow-dangerously-skip-permissions, --include-partial-messages, --init, --init-only, --maintenance), VSCode session forking and rewind functionality, expanded monitoring/telemetry environment variables, and multiple bug fixes. The guide changelog was updated to version 2026.1.5 documenting all additions.
updates.sections: Changelog, CLI Flags Reference, Environment Variables, Using Arguments (Custom Commands), VSCode Plugin Features, This Guide's Changelog

updates.description: Updated the README.md with Claude Code releases v2.1.14 through v2.1.17 (January 20-22, 2026). Key additions include: (1) Four new version entries in the changelog documenting features like the new task management system with dependency tracking, npm installation deprecation notice, history-based bash autocomplete, plugin pinning to git commit SHAs, and VSCode native plugin management with OAuth session browsing; (2) Added npm deprecation warning to the installation section; (3) Documented TodoWrite dependency tracking capability; (4) Added new "Bash Mode Autocomplete" keyboard shortcut section; (5) Expanded VSCode Plugin Features with native plugin management, remote session browsing, and /usage command; (6) Added Plugin Pinning documentation; (7) Updated the guide's changelog with version 2026.1.4 documenting all changes made.
updates.sections: [Changelog, Installation, Core Tools (TodoWrite), Keyboard Shortcuts, Plugins, VSCode Plugin Features, This Guide's Changelog]

updates.description: Updated the README.md with new information from Claude Code v2.1.10: Added the new `Setup` hook event (triggered via `--init`, `--init-only`, or `--maintenance` CLI flags), the `PermissionRequest` hook event, keyboard shortcut 'c' for copying OAuth URL during login, VSCode plugin features (install count display and trust warnings). Added v2.1.10 to the CLI changelog with all its features and fixes. Updated the Auto-Update Pipeline section to use the new code.claude.com documentation URL. Fixed a table formatting issue in the hook events section. All changes verified from official GitHub releases page.
updates.sections: [Changelog, Hook Events, Keyboard Shortcuts, Plugins (VSCode Features), This Guide's Changelog, Auto-Update Pipeline]
